thread.title: Yaass! Could Bongo Maffin's Speedy be joining US drama NCIS? - Times LIVE
thread.title_full: Yaass! Could Bongo Maffin's Speedy be joining US drama NCIS? - Times LIVE

title: Yaass! Could Bongo Maffin's Speedy be joining US drama NCIS? - Times LIVE
text:
A post shared by KING GIFT (@speedythegift) on Feb 14, 2017 at 8:18am PST 
He later added a video with one of the show's writers, encouraging South Africans to watch the episode they were filming. A post shared by KING GIFT (@speedythegift) on Feb 15, 2017 at 1:56am PST There has been no official comment from the show about Speedy's role and several attempts to contact him were unsuccessful. Share
